Name: Name Change, Osvaldo Vega Plaza, Manhattan
Title: A Local Law in relation to a plaza name, Osvaldo Vega Plaza, Borough of Manhattan.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
	Section 1.  The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.

New Name				Present Name			Limits

Osvaldo Vega Plaza                         None                                     the intersection of East                
                                                                                                      106th Street and Third               
                                                                                                      Avenue
      
      
      ï¿½  2.  This local law shall take effect immediately.


	


	FN:dd
	LS# 546
